analysis.description: MCCoin.isContract (/unique_chucks/25/0x1e3c8d7e1249b8c53e84f6df70a7558c4994b591.sol#246-253) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x1e3c8d7e1249b8c53e84f6df70a7558c4994b591.sol:
